name: Baby Factory
description:
You are not in control of "the child", the child is completely out of control and wander randomly around the factory. You can build 7 floors at a time to save him from falling. You can raise walls to protect from cannon-traps.

This game is extremely difficult, my personal record is surviving 43 seconds, tell me your highest scores.

I would love to get feedback, i want to point out that i ended this project 1 day 6 hours earlier due to family events...

I started game dev in february this year and would love some feedback

[KEYBINDS]: RMB - Raise wall, LMB - Raise ground
